context: Could you recommend some films directed by Duncan Jones?
Sure. He directed Moon, Warcraft, and Source Code.
What type of film is Source Code?
It is listed as a drama.
Do you know who stars in it?
resp: Sure. Source code stars Jake Gyllenhaal, Scott Bakula, Russell Peters and Cas Anvar.
